movies.shortDescription: A PATRIOT'S DAY Official Screener

movies.title: THE STORY OF MOTHER'S DAY (Official Screener)
movies.shortDescription:
THE STORY OF MOTHER’S DAY is a new Dean Cain faith film that celebrates the history of Mother’s Day.  From Kentucky to West Virginia, this special day has been woven into American tradition as the third most celebrated holiday.   But just how did it start? 

When students of Audubon High School return after the COVID pandemic, they have just a few weeks to produce their end of the year performance.  Struggling to find the right script, music, & choreography, the students find inspiration when they discover the origin and the true meaning behind Mother’s Day. 

101  Minutes

movies.title: STRANGE FRIENDS (2021) Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
Mobster Ross Blakely is about to get into a difficult spot when his devout sister Samantha comes to him with an unusual request: rescue her daughter Jennifer from the life of drugs and the influence of her drug-dealing boyfriend.

Shocked that his once religious niece had gone so astray, he agrees to his sister’s request.

But when rescuing Jennifer doesn’t go as smoothly as planned, Ross finds himself amongst the company of some strange friends, who hope to help him rescue his niece and possibly save him along the way.

Official website: www.StrangeFriendsFilm.com

Based on the book, "Strange Friends" by Gary Lee Vincent, available here: https://amzn.to/2QvnjpK

movies.title: THE MAN WHO WENT TO HEAVEN Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
THE MAN WHO WENT TO HEAVEN is not your typical after-life film, it intertwines Biblical truths with a heartfelt faith story that will both entertain and ultimately shine more light on a topic so rarely discussed in churches today.

“Hollywood has barraged the movie screens about Heaven, the problem is that many of these films are saturated with fabrications that leave the audience confused and disillusioned. 
It’s that disillusion that unfortunately distorts the Gospel.”- Jason Campbell, JCFILMS

“A clear, descriptive, creative and Biblical depiction of Heaven is so greatly needed in our culture today.”- Pastor Levi Cushman

movies.title: THE NOTEBOOKS Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
THE NOTEBOOKS is an inspiring film about friendship, love and hope.  When Preston Walker suddenly finds himself forgetting his memories, he puts a game plan in place to help him remember all of his life’s greatest events.

“This amazing film does not shy away from the turmoil the disease brings.”

“Creatively highlights the wonderful compassion and love generated by caregivers.” 

“Today, 5 million people in America suffer with Alzheimer’s Disease.  In the next decade, that number will triple.  Thank you JCFilms for tackling this issue.”

“Inspiring!  Compassionate!  Moving!”

movies.title: LIGHT UP NIGHT Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
Light Up Night in Bridgeport, WV is a celebrated tradition that attracts thousands from its community.  It’s truly a magical event!  And now, this fairy-tale experience is the setting of a new Dean Cain Christmas movie.

After her husband dies, Ruth travels with her mother-in-law, Naomi, back to the family farm in Bridgeport, West Virginia.  While Ruth tries to save the farm and battle against a new Recreation Center being built nearby, her unique ‘charm’ 
catches the eye of Bridgeport Mayor, Boaz Perez or just ‘Bo.’

movies.title: THE BRIDGE Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
Dean Cain, Tim Ross and Michael Sigler star in this new faith-based thriller about an unnerving compulsion that attracts people from all over to commit suicide off West Virginia’s most iconic bridge. 

THE BRIDGE attempts to answer some of the questions why young people commit suicide.  It also examines the demonic presence involved with suicide.  The film is an emotional and religious experience that deals with human loss and grief.  From a group of teens obsessed with witchcraft to adults with psychological meltdowns, the film covers a multitude of aspects concerning suicide.

movies.title: GODSEND (Official Screener)
movies.shortDescription:
“Michael Ochotorena delivers the performance of his career!”

When a man (Michael Ochotorena, "John Light," "Dispatched") wakes up under a bridge to discover he no longer knows who he is or how he got there, his life brutally unfolds as a homeless person.  

Enduring the scorn of random people, the elements, and coping with a terrible head injury, he finds hope in the unlikeliest of friends: a dog and a pastor (Greg Mason, "Coronavirus: Perfect Storm," "Dispatched"). 

Together, they explore kindness, compassion, and what it means to live—and to become a Godsend to others.

movies.title: DON'T GIVE UP Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
When pastor, writer and actress Amy Samuel 
was suffering from debilitating depression, it was difficult to find reasons to keep going until God healed her, and helped her reshape her life into something amazing and abundant.

In DON’T GIVE UP she tells the true story of her meeting with Jesus and how it opened her eyes to the gifts around her.

“ONE in FIVE American women suffer from depression.  That’s 12 MILLION!”

“Don’t Give Up reverses the rumor that depression is just a normal part of being a woman!”

“Every women’s ministry needs a copy of this film in their church library.”

“Dean Cain and Amy Samuel are dynamic in this much needed film.”

“The most transparent faith film ever!"

movies.title: ONE LIFE AT A TIME Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
Carson Campbell is (played by Luke Schroder) a self-absorbed teen that finds himself in trouble when he plays a video prank on a homeless man.  His entitlement lifestyle becomes an illusion when he’s sentenced to perform community service at a local homeless shelter.  Dean Cain plays his egocentric father who challenges his son’s transformation.  Eventually, both lives are changed ONE LIFE AT A TIME.  

In celebration of 120 years of ministry, ONE LIFE AT A TIME not only takes a historical look at the mission, but examines today's problems with homelessness.

movies.title: PERFECT STORM Official Screener
movies.shortDescription: PERFECT STORM Official Screener

movies.title: DESK CLERK Official Screener
movies.shortDescription: DESK CLERK Official Screener

movies.title: THE PRODIGAL COWBOY Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
Two brothers; Nick, an athletic high school football star and Mark a rising name on the rodeo circuit have always been rivals. But, after a family tragedy the competition heats up for their father’s attention.

Disney’s, SECRETARIAT actor, Otto Thorwarth teams up with WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP BULL RIDER, Scott Mendes to deliver this Western style modern-day story of the prodigal son.

movies.title: PATIENT ZERO Official Screener
movies.shortDescription: PATIENT ZERO Official Screener

movies.title: BEING TRUMP - Official Screener
movies.shortDescription: BEING TRUMP - Official Screener

movies.title: DISPATCHED Official Screener
movies.shortDescription: DISPATCHED Official Screener

movies.title: JACK JONAH Screener
movies.shortDescription:
Jack Jonah was an extraordinary teen with real dreams of a bright future. On April 6, 2016, he became a heroin overdose statistic. Now his story is inspiring and educating many on this national epidemic.

JACK JONAH is a true story about a family’s endurance and struggles after an unspeakable tragedy. 

Actor Dean Cain leads the cast in this multi-plot drama uncovering the deadly drug culture in Western Massachusetts. 

For more information, visit www.JacksFilm.com or www.JCFilms.org.

movies.title: The Zombie Club Official Screener
movies.shortDescription: After a mix-up in a shipment of lab frogs goes terribly wrong.  6 Teens find themselves in a race against the clock to find a cure.  A race that will alter their lives forever…. and the lives of thousands.

movies.title: A CHILD OF THE KING Screener
movies.shortDescription:
In the bordering villages of the Amazon Rainforest, children, toddlers, and teenagers from the jungle search trash cans for food, steal knives to protect themselves at night and live in fear of being forced into the dark world of sex trafficking.  

For these desperately needy children, nothing was safe, nothing was free until they encountered the love of Jesus through the compassion of Dr. Wes King.  Kings’ step of faith is a stunning example of how God miraculously uses the willing to transform the lives of thousands of forgotten children with His hope and healing. It is a story of immense faith, suffering, and love. The children whose stories are revealed in this film will change your heart forever.

movies.title: JOHN LIGHT Official Screener
movies.shortDescription: JOHN LIGHT Screener / Not for Distribution

movies.title: THE CABIN Official Screener
movies.shortDescription: The Cabin is a modern day film about spiritual warfare telling the story of how one man courageously waged war against his personal demons.  This suspenseful thriller shows the spiritual battlefield we all face each and everyday in an unusual and realistic way.

movies.title: THE PERFECT DAY Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
A film by 9/11 survivors and U.S. Navy Seals.

Retired Navy S.E.A.L. Christopher 'Soup' Campbell is a tactical specialist for a private security firm at a counter terrorism training facility hidden in the Blue Ridge Mountains. The military and intelligence community call him 'Soup', not only because of the familiarity of his last name, but his ability to combine and assess a variety of threats into a strategic tactical response. A specific skill t hat came useful on many of his combat tours into Iraq and Afghanistan.

As more and more acts of terror are approaching America, 'Soup' and his team of retired military and security contractors begin to hear about a frightening new strategy from the enemy. Rumors of terrorist threats in America  have always run about, but this time it's different...the chatter is coming from everywhere. Can a group of retired military warriors unravel this vicious plan?

Teamed with a small group of just average day Americans and veterans, 'Soup' leads a tactical reconnaissance campaign in America. Their mission: Who is this threat? How is it getting over the border? And, what exactly are they trying to accomplish?

THE PERFECT DAY is an action-packed thriller of suspense as the plotting of an immense terrorist attack in America is unraveled. From the larger trigger attack that signals the multiple simultaneous deadly attacks that pepper America's landscape on one perfect day. It depicts the brutal reality of how governmental bureaucracy is enabling its own national security vulnerability.

It's a prevailing patriotic film with a simple message: The unashamed and vigilant American is the true hero!

For more information, visit www.JCFilms.org.

movies.title: A PROMISE TO ASTRID Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
A  'Promise to Astrid' is a heartwarming new faith inspired film based on a true story about a remarkable woman that used random acts of kindness to change the lives of an entire community. 

 A car accident leaves a family in a predicament, triggering a series of encounters with a range of personalities.  When their elderly neighbor Astrid (JoAnn F. Peterson) comes into the picture, it’s the least of Mike (Jeremy Gladen) and Cindy’s (Luba Hansen) expectations that she will change everything.  Her clever and mysterious ways confound everyone around her, including her Pastor (Dean Cain).

Astrid seems to have all the answers and promptly sets her plan into action.  With wisdom, intuition, and maybe a little bit of help from above, she makes everything turn out just right. There are still good stories to tell, and this is certainly one of those “feel-good” movies you’ll remember.
 Emotional, humorous, and a little bit mysterious, some things you just can’t explain.  There are bigger things at work, than what we understand.  Accept them with trust, and be grateful.  And have faith that good things will happen.

Based on the award winning book by Michael Tourville, titled the same, 'A Promise to Astrid' stars Dean Cain and is scheduled for release in 2019.​

movies.title: THE FOLLOWER Official Screener
movies.shortDescription: Dealing with some adversity in his life has left Elisha (Michael Sigler) in search of purpose and meaning. After a life-long pursuit seemingly becomes an impossibility, he unexpectedly finds hope and redemption on a haphazard road trip with a stranger (Timothy Goodwin). Through the duos misadventures and their continual run-ins with a no-nonsense Sheriff (Dean Cain), Elisha realizes what it means to be a follower of Christ and that “God doesn’t call the qualified but He qualifies the called.”

movies.title: VIRTUOUS Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
“FIVE DOVES – Powerfully shows that perseverance and faith pays off.” – The Dove Foundation

“VIRTUOUS is a great film about dealing with adversity and overcoming it.” - Governor Mike Huckabee

When a young woman, Simone Burner (singer/songwriter, Brandy Allison), is accused of murdering the man who assaulted her, she seeks out the help of attorney Jack Evans (Erik Estrada, TV’s CHIPS) to prove her innocence. A ruthless and corrupt prosecutor engages her in a trial that brings the past she’s longed to escape to the forefront of her defense. VIRTUOUS will inspire and ignite you to live the principles of Proverbs 31 – faith, integrity, wisdom, and honor.

For more information, visit www.JCFilms.org.

movies.title: ONE CHURCH Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
“If we ever forget that we’re one nation under God, then we will be one nation gone under.” – Ronald Reagan

In the political thriller ONE CHURCH, a national tragedy turns into a personal vendetta for aspiring politician Cornelius Barlow. As religious freedom comes to the forefront of public debate, the divisive argument – like so many others that disguise more sinister agendas – hides behind the veiled language of coexistence, inclusion, and unity.

At the center of a spiritual revolution, families are divided, churches are closed, and lives are even lost as an impending new law demands all American pulpits promote a single, unified religion.

When all seems lost, God uses the most unlikely people to defend His church during a battle to reclaim the most important message ever told.

Would our elected lawmakers ever abolish the freedom of worship, enforce a single unified religion, and vote to establish totalitarian government control?

Starring Jessica Lynch, the first American POW to be rescued since the Vietnam War.

For more information, vist www.JCFilms.org.

movies.title: MEGAN'S CHRISTMAS MIRACLE Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
Experience the magic and miracles all around you during this holiday season and all year through.

Dean Cain stars in this enchanting Christmas story about a teenage girl that finds hope in a magical nativity display at her church. MEGAN'S CHRISTMAS MIRACLE is a journey into the many unexpected life interruptions Megan experiences. The film starts with a hurt little girl and ends with a confident and assured beautiful lady.

The uplifting, mystical, faith-inspired film stars Brooklyn Nelson (Young Elsa in Disney's New York Broadway Musical FROZEN), Timothy Goodwin (ADAM RUINS EVERYTHING, MOM), and Dean Cain (LOIS & CLARK: THE NEW ADVENTURES OF SUPERMAN, SUPERGIRL).

At the heart of MEGAN'S CHRISTMAS MIRACLE is a young girl's exploration of love, loss, hope, and the true meaning of Christmas. It also shows us how love and hope carry us through to our adult years as we hold onto our faith through life's ups and downs, and trust that miracles really can happen.

For more information, visit www.JCFilms.org.

movies.title: UNCOMMON Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
"Students are clearly protected by the Constitution...They may exercise their religions free speech rights." - Mat Straver, Liberty Council Founder

"Five Doves" - The Dove Foundation

"Every teenager should go see the faith-based film UNCOMMON." - Charisma News

When the students of Rosewood High lose their drama department due to budget buts, they decide to create their own! Equipped with unique talents, they bond together to prepare the perfect production with a modern take on the Bible's parables. Fighting overwhelming challenges, the teens defend their privilege to worship, meet, and perform.

Armed with expert legal counsel and unexpected help from Christian music's finest, these teens realize what it means to be...UNCOMMON!

For more information, visit www.JCFilms.org.

movies.title: FINDING FAITH Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
This will either tear them apart or bring new meaning to their faith!

The Garrett's are a model family for their church and community. but when an online predator abducts 14-year-old Faith Garrett, their faith is pushed to the breaking point.

Erik Estrada (THE CROSS AND THE SWITCHBLADE, CHIPS) stars in this powerful story, inspired by actual events. The desperate search for Faith brings her family, church, and community to their knees, threatening to either tear them apart or strengthen their faith as never before.

From Sheriff Mike Brown (INTERNET CRIMES AGAINST CHILDREN TASK FORCE) comes a compelling faith-based film about Internet safety every family needs to watch together.

For more information, visit www.JCFilms.org.

movies.title: NAIL 32 Official Screener
movies.shortDescription:
"If you don't win, don't come home." - Jasper Weaver

As a young man, Jasper 'Buck' Livingston made a decision that influenced and forever changed American cowboy culture. Even through disappointment, hardship, and failure, Buck's incredible journey as a north Texas rodeo cowboy, rancher, father, and preacher proved that every life matters, and even ordinary men can live a life filled with extraordinary purpose.

NAIL 32 is an exciting and emotional true-life story that champions the importance of being courageous, honorable, and truly God-fearing.

Can a cowboy be a Christian? Can a Christian be a cowboy?

While exploring the answers to some of life's toughest questions, NAIL 32 encourages all men to stand up and walk with God. And never, ever sell your soul or your saddle, because...life's a long, long, ride.

For more information, visit www.JCFilms.org.
